ch.aplu.util

Class TextEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.util.EntryItem
      • ch.aplu.util.TextEntry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleEntry, IntEntry, LongEntry, StringEntry

    public class TextEntry
extends EntryItem
    Base class of StringEntry, DoubleEntry, IntegerEntry. Text fields are displayed vertically in the EntryPane.

      • isTouched

        public boolean isTouched()
        Returns true, if text field widget was hit by the mouse until the last call if this method. Any further call will return false, until the button is hit again. Puts calling thread to sleep for 1 millisecond, so it can be used in a tight polling loop.
        Returns:
        true, if the widget was hit since the last call
